[![Curseforge][CURSFG:shd]][CURSFG:url] [![CKAN][CKAN:shd]][CKAN:url] [![GitHub][GITHUB:shd]][GITHUB:url] [![SpaceDock][SPCDCK:shd]][SPCDCK:url]

# Komplexity (KPLX)  

### for Custom Barn Kit  

## by [@zer0Kerbal][LINK:zer0kerbal]  

Kerbal Space Center building levels increased to a maximum of ten levels instead of the stock game's four.



### Preamble  

> After playing KSP for a while I wanted a tad more granularity to the building upgrades at the Kerbal Space Center. Going from 30 max parts to 255 felt a little too much.
>
> The stock game's four levels (initial + three upgrades) just seemed too basic, and very unKerbalistic. So I sat down with Bill and added some Komplexity and moar levels!
>
> ***Yes***, now there are a total of ten level (initial plus nine upgrades) for every building in the KSC. This mod depends on [Module Manager][thread:mm] and [Custom Barn Kit][thread:CBK] by [@Sarbian][LINK:sarbian]. Might not play nice with [Bureaucracy][thread:bczy].

### Promo Video

[![Watch the video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/erhEQpBZGas/default.jpg)](https://youtu.be/erhEQpBZGas)

---

### Notes:  

> ***costs scale with game difficulty settings*** (as does stock) and the initial (level one) costs are in case you damage / destroy a building.  

### Help Wanted:  

> * A final polish pass on the wiki would be very helpful.
> * Setting up this mod to use [Patch Manager][thread:pmx]
> * Have a request? Glad to have them!
> * [GitHub][GitHub:url] push is the best way to contribute.
> * *Additions and corrections welcome!*.

### Installation Directions

***Use***
  CurseForge/OverWolf App (currently does not install dependencies) [^3]  

  <a href="https://download.curseforge.com/">
    <img src="https://www.overwolf.com/brand-guidelines/img/logo2.svg" alt="CurseForge/OverWolf App" width="15%" height="15%">
</a>

or [![CKAN][CKAN:img]][CKAN:url] [^3]

### Dependencies

* [Kerbal Space Program][KSP:website] [![][shield:ksp]][KSP:website] *may* work on other versions ]/YMMV/  
* [Module Manager][thread:mm]  [](^1) 
* [Custom Barn Kit][thread:CBK]  

### Supports  

* [Strategia][thread:stra]  

### Conflicts

- [Bureaucracy][thread:bczy] Caveat Emptor: *Might conflict or have unintended consequences to combining with*
- [SETI-CustomBarnKit][thread:cbkseti] - *never tested*
- [Custom Barn Kit - RO build][thread:cbkro] - *never tested*

#### tags

* plugin, config, custombarnkit
